author: archiron
body:
#### PR description:

These changes are targeting the Phase-2 validation only and have no effect on the Run 3 validation. The updates made in the recent [PR33421](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33421)) for the miniAOD are ported to the RECO validation, they allow to make on single set of validation plots out of two input GsfElectron collections (one for the barrel electrons, one for the HGCAL electrons). In the case of the Run 3 validation, the same collection is used for both barrel and endcaps.

The modifications are made in Validation/RecoEGamma/plugins folder :
ElectronMcSignalValidator.cc/h, 
ElectronMcFakeValidator.cc/h,
and into the Validation/RecoEGamma/python folder :
ElectronMcSignalValidator_gedGsfElectrons_cfi.py, 
ElectronMcFakePostValidator_cfi.py, 
ElectronMcFakeValidator_gedGsfElectrons_cfi.py, 
ElectronMcSignalValidatorPt1000_gedGsfElectrons_cfi.py. 

We also made some corrections into Validation/RecoEGamma/test folder :
ElectronMcSignalPostValidation_cfg.py, 
ElectronMcSignalValidation_gedGsfElectrons_cfg.py, 
ElectronMcSignalPostValidationMiniAOD_cfg.py, 
ElectronMcSignalValidationMiniAOD_cfg.py, 
electronValidationCheck_Env.py,
ElectronMcFakePostValidation_cfg.py,
ElectronMcFakeValidation_gedGsfElectrons_cfg.py,
ElectronMcSignalPostValidationPt1000_cfg.py,
ElectronMcSignalValidationPt1000_gedGsfElectrons_cfg.py,

here is the comparison for the CMSSW_12_0_0_pre3 release :
![RECOstd_PoPtrueVsEta_pfxb](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/124144317-253d8f00-da8c-11eb-9199-bb37d44a7843.png) ![RECOmod_PoPtrueVsEta_pfxb](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5586847/124144341-28d11600-da8c-11eb-9b9f-f1e4f86ee900.png)
Onto the left we have the actual comparison, and on the right we have the comparison made after the modifications.


#### PR validation:

compilation is OK, basics tests (scram b runtests or local tests) are OK too.
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos tests are fine (19 15 14 9 4 1 1 1 1 tests passed, 19 3 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 failed).
Most of errors are "DAS_ERROR" or "open file error" (140.56, 136.88811 for example), but some ran correctly with our modifications (28234.0_TTbar_14TeV, 11634.911_TTbar_14TeV).
here is the run-log : [runall-report-step123-.LOG](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/6753522/runall-report-step123-.LOG)
